advertiser_id.title: Google Advertiser Id
advertiser_id.description: Parameter defines the Google Advertiser ID.

text.title: Text
text.description: Parameter defines the text you want to search.

region.title: Region
region.description: Parameter defines from where you want the search to originate.

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: Parameter defines the target platform where ads are displayed.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Parameter defines the start date for which you want the search results to begin.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: Parameter defines the end date for which you want the search results to conclude.

creative_format.title: Creative Format
creative_format.description: Parameter defines the format you want to filter by.

num.title: Num
num.description: Parameter defines the maximum number of results to return.

next_page_token.title: Next Page Token
next_page_token.description: Parameter defines the next page token.

political_ads.title: Political Ads
political_ads.description: The parameter determine if the advertiser promotes political advertisement.
